AI Description: Cell Ranger DNA is a software package from 10x Genomics that enables the analysis of single-cell DNA sequencing data. It is specifically designed to process single-cell data from linked-read sequencing technologies, such as the 10x Genomics Chromium platform, to identify structural variants, copy number variations, and clonality in individual cells.
Core Features: Analysis Of Single-Cell DNA Sequencing Data, Identification Of Structural Variants, Detection Of Copy Number Variations, Estimation Of Clonality In Individual Cells, Support For Linked-Read Sequencing Technologies
General Tags: Single-Cell DNA Sequencing, Structural Variants, Copy Number Variations, Clonality Analysis, Linked-Read Sequencing
